document.full_text: despite losing amar'e stoudemire at halftime, the knicks pushed the celtics to the brink again, losing only in the final seconds and putting them in a 2-0 hole in the series.
document.title: celtics 96, knicks 93: celtics down depleted knicks to take 2-0 series lead
lines_and_colors: despite losing amar'e stoudemire at halftime, the knicks pushed the celtics to the brink again, losing only in the final seconds and putting them in a 2-0 hole in the series.
